Photos

A glimpse into my life beyond code — family, projects, and creative pursuits

← Back to Home

Why I Share Photos

I believe in showing the human side of development work. The projects I build aren't just code — they're solutions to real problems, often inspired by my own life and experiences.

These photos give you a sense of who I am outside of work: a dad who loves building things, someone who values family time, and a developer who finds inspiration in the world around me.

Family Memory

Family

I'm selective about what I share publicly. Family photos are kept private, and I respect everyone's privacy. What you see here are moments I'm comfortable sharing that give you a sense of who I am as a person.
